thread.title: Hit the Links: The week of coverage leading up to Boston College-Clemson
thread.title_full: Hit the Links: The week of coverage leading up to Boston College-Clemson

title: Hit the Links: The week of coverage leading up to Boston College-Clemson
text:
Email @Aaron_Brenner Oct 17 2015 6:00 am Oct 17 9:06 am Clemson fans enjoy the pre-game amnoshere. The Clemson Tigers played host to the Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets at Memorial Stadium in Clemson Saturday, October 10, 2015.GWINN DAVIS / FOR POST AND COURIER × 
CLEMSON – First order of business: Boston College announced Friday evening it will start true freshman Jeff Smith at quarterback. He is the Eagles’ rushing leader with 257 yards, but he has completed 9-of-30 passes for 86 yards and an interception. This is Smith’s first career start. 
Chock full of notes, and a few features in between, from the past week of coverage previewing Boston College-Clemson:
